isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS, BUMPER AND RUNNING BOARDS - MXT - REMOVE AND INSTALL - Hood Latch

svcsubproc.title: Hood Latch - Removal
svcsubproc.para: The hood latching mechanism consists of two assemblies: the upper latch mounted on the hood and the lower latch mounted on the fender extension.
Refer to Figure 38 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Release the latching mechanism on both sides of the hood (Item 1).
Remove the two upper latch mounting bolts (Item 2), nuts (Item 3), and upper latch assembly (Item 4) from the hood (Item 1).
Remove the two lower latch mounting bolts (Item 5), nuts (Item 6), and lower latch (Item 7) from the fender extension (Item 8).
Follow same procedure for removal of opposite side.

svcsubproc.title: Hood Latch - Installation
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 38 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the upper latching assembly (Item 4) on the hood (Item 1) and align the mounting holes of the latch assembly with the mounting holes on the hood (Item 1).
Install the upper latch assembly (Item 4) with two mounting bolts (Item 2) and nuts (Item 3).
Position the lower latch assembly (Item 7) on the fender extension (Item 8) and align the mounting holes of the latch assembly with the mounting holes on the fender extension (Item 8).
Install the lower latching assembly (Item 7) with two mounting bolts (Item 5) and nuts (Item 6).
Follow same procedure for installation on opposite side.
